# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Tell me about Baster Kiton

Відповідь: Baster Kiton is a Melbourne-based printmaking collective made up of a diverse group of local and international artists, founded in 2009. The collective focusses primarily on screen printing, but also incorporates other mediums such as painting, installations, ceramics and photography. By challenging social and political boundaries, Baster Kiton ignites discussion, provokes thought and encourages the viewer to explore alternative perspectives. The collective have showcased their work in exhibitions around Australia, and have contributed to numerous festivals and special events both at home and abroad.
